mapper.update: update device_rulechain set DEVICE_NUM = #{deviceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHAIN_NUM = #{chainNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, OP_FLAG = #{opFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
